Our step by step process

is designed to ensure that every stage of developing your new AI solutions is meticulously planned and executed to perfection.

1

Book your free discovery call

On this call you'll share a little more about your company, the processes you have in place, and we will suggest areas in which AI can help you.

More Info
2

Planning & strategy session

After the discovery call we will start planning the course of action. We'll schedule a Strategy Session call where we will share with you the next steps.

Read more
3

Development

Once we've agreed on the strategy and plan of action, we get to work and start developing your new AI solutions.Our expert team utilizes the latest technologies and best practices to ensure that your solutions are not only innovative but also tailored to meet your specific needs.

Read more
4

Deployment + optimization

Once we're ready with the development, we will deploy the product and start looking for potential areas of improvement.

What can it do for you?

Discover an extensive suite of robust tools and functionalities thoughtfully designed to enhance your interactions on our platform.

Sales and marketing automation

Content creation, full-funnel automation, lead routing, CRM, outbound, payments, contracts and much more.

Read more

Image, voice, text recognition and analysis

Analyze and parse documents, biometrics, emotion, facial, products, videos and more to summarize or automate actions based off keywords, identity, sentiment, etc.

Read more

Predictive analytics

Data-driven decision making through risk analytics, demand or inventory forecasting and other future planning tasks.

Read more

Conversational AI

Prompt engineering, automatic replies and more for customer service, sales, chat bots, front-office and marketing.

Read more

Project management

We connect all manual, repetitive steps in a process, from task handoff to completion. Such as onboarding, admin, accounting, invoicing.

Read more

Staff augmentation

Save employees hours a day by automating their most tedious daily tasks. We’ve even replaced entire teams of virtual assistants.

Read more

Data silos

We automate data entry, collection, cleansing and reporting from nuanced and silo’d locations, for fast and accurate decision making.

Read more

Customer service

Most customer service questions and responses are similar and repetitive. As a result, most CS tasks can be automated.

Read more

Connect apps

Most of your apps can be integrated with each-other for instant handoffs of data and consolidation of information.
